alert.note: Alert for Lower Clark Fork Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 11:04AM MST until December 30 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 11 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches in the valleys, 4 to 6 inches Haugan to Lookout Pass, and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Periods of moderate to heavy snow are expected Friday afternoon and evening with low visibility and quickly changing conditions. * WHERE...Evaro Hill, Highway 200 Thompson Falls to Plains, Highway 200 Trout Creek to Heron, and I-90 Lookout Pass to Haugan. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 11 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
